data.communities: Will be discussed on ezmlm mailing list.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
No other modules exist which do the same of my
    Mail::Ezmlm::Archive. A Mail::Ezmlm module exists in the CPAN; it
    provides object methods for managing ezmlm mailing lists. This is
    why I've chosen Mail::Ezmlm::Archive as my namespace, since it is a
    separate module (it does not address list management, but archive
    browsing).
